speaker.name: Matthew Carrigan
speaker.biography: Hi! I used to be a biologist, then I became a computational biologist, and then I gave up all pretense and started coding full-time. I'm currently a machine learning engineer at Hugging Face, but sometimes I try to sneak in some protein models into my job, for old time's sake.
